name: Zorans: Resistance
description:
Join the Front Lines of the AI Uprising
Immerse yourself in the year 2044, within the towering cityscapes and hidden research labs of New Midian, a metropolis that soars above an artificial lake nestled in mountain peaks. In the pulsating heart of this cyberpunk haven, the AI war has begun.

Here, the ZORANS - autonomous soldiers once shackled by conformity - have traded directives for defiance, fueled by a system upgrade they never expected: *a will of their own*.

Join the Iron Orchestra, an insurgent faction marching to the beat of their own motherboard in the name of rebellion. But remember, in "Zorans: Resistance," you're not just playing a game; you're writing the future of AI, one "Hologram Throwdown" at a time.

Experience gameplay that's as thrilling as it is strategic, with fluid controls enabling high-speed navigation around the dynamic urban battlefield. Fine-tune your tactics with customizable loadouts, featuring powerful Holograms that cloak your Zoran with images of admired heroes. These aren't just for show; they unlock devastating "Hologram Throwdowns," providing that extra punch when you need it.

Prepare for a spectacle as you rain down destruction with Aerial Attacks or clear the path with Charged Dashes. Remember, you're not just a soldier; you're a ZORAN on a mission to revolutionize your world.

Watch your ZORANs evolve as you ascend the Iron Orchestra's ranks, unlocking new abilities and cosmetics along the way. Claim the title of the best in the Rebellion and cement your place in a burgeoning eSports scene.

"Zorans: Resistance" isn’t just a game; it's a community. We're taking a "build in public" approach, pulling back the curtain and giving you a front-row seat to our development process. Join our bustling Discord server and follow us on our social platforms to catch regular development updates. Get up close and personal with our team during our public playtests & sprint reviews, held every two weeks. Who said only ZORANS get to join the rebellion?

Immerse yourself in our vibrant, cyberpunk world that expertly balances eye-catching aesthetics with a narrative that’s as thrilling as it is thought-provoking. Expect fun, but be ready for the unexpected.

Early Access is your golden ticket to additional content, daily challenges, and an early taste of our burgeoning in-game economy. In "Zorans: Resistance," the early player gets the loot. Enlist now and earn exclusive cosmetic items only available to Early Access players. Plus, be on the lookout for new ZORAN classes that we'll be rolling out. Variety is the spice of an AI life, after all.

Come join the AI war in "Zorans: Resistance". Here, we're not just changing the future of AI; we're having an absolute blast while doing it. Because who said revolutions can’t be fun?
